name: Joined Forces (noskro)
description:
Disclaimer

This game is an entry to the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Due to reason I only had a couple of hours (4 or 5) for a project. So this is more a concept for what a game could be. Therefore it is missing a log of polishing (as does this page).

I don't expect good votes. I rather have comments on how you like the general idea and if I should continue pursuing this concept. 

Controls

A & D or Left & Right Arrow to move

Space to Join both player fixing their relative position or separate them

If Separted:

W & Up Arrow to  Jump

if Joined:

W & Up Arrow to flip gravity
